modName: Selena Gomez - Save Game (Follower Mod is Out NOW)
descriptionHtml:
[b]UPDATE[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57432/?]Follower Mod[/url] is available now but is currently still a WIP 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Those who have downloaded could you let me know if everything is okay and working properly. If not let me know and I'll sort it ASAP.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first ever attempt at creating a mod and am working on making this into a standalone follower but am having problems getting this to work as I've used RaceMenu sliders and I'm not sure how to keep them saved when I import them to Creation Kit. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

If you like my work please endorse would love to make more celeb save games/followers for you guys if you like these. If I hit 5 Endorsements I will start taking requests for my next upload. At the moment I'm thinking of creating Katy Perry, Ariana Grande or Rita Ora next. [HIT] 

My file's received 5 endorsements and as promised will now take requests, leave a comment in the post section and I will start working on whichever celeb or character gets the most requests

The character uses the following mods and are needed to make it look like the screenshot (but you can change the hair without effecting the resemblance too much):

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/url] [Required]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]﻿ [Required]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url]﻿ 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips HD[/url]
SG Hair Pack 268

I use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB[/url] and use the fantasy version.

If you're having problems with the textures not looking smooth download this (it helped me out a lot as I'm a relative new comer to modding):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51038/?]SKSE ini pre-download for lazy users[/url]

If you have any questions feel free to ask, will try to get back to you ASAP.

If you decide to use the save game I would appreciate it if you could take some screenshots and leave some feedback too on how I could improve.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IMPROTANT Install info

Just found out that you will need to manually install this, NMM didn't copy the file correctly.

Extract the file and copy the two files (.ess and .skse) into your save game files location

For me it's C:\Users\*\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: MysticalSpacePotato
